document.full_text: actress lindsay lohan was sentenced on wednesday to four months in jail after changing her plea and effectively admitting stealing a $2,500 gold necklace from a los angeles store.
document.title: lindsay lohan expected to serve jail term at home
lines_and_colors: actress lindsay lohan was sentenced on wednesday to four months in jail after changing her plea and effectively admitting stealing a $2,500 gold necklace from a los angeles store.
